snippet: Sean Payton, a Super Bowl-winning coach who was suspended for the entire 2012 season, signed a five-year extension.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New Orleans Saints coach Sean Payton signs five-year contract extension that will run through the 2017 season; other football developments noted.

byline.original: By BEN SHPIGEL and THE ASSOCIATED PRESS

lead_paragraph: Sean Payton, a Super Bowl-winning coach who was suspended for the entire 2012 season, signed a five-year extension.

headline.seo: Sean Payton Signs Deal to Remain With Saints
headline.main: Payton Signs Five-Year Deal to Remain With the Saints
headline.print_headline: Payton Signs Five-Year Deal To Remain With the Saints
